name: Uphill Skedaddle
description:
Avoid the walls, but you might not want to avoid the bombs - blowing them up gives you points! Staying near the top of the screen does too, but it also makes the difficulty go up faster...

Grab  a friend and a controller or two and go head to head!

The instructions.txt file will tell you how to play in more detail.

Created within 48 hours for the 2018 Sarasota Game Jam.
